      InternalCallContext InternalCallContextFactory.createInternalCallContext(CallContext context)
      Create an internal call context without populating the account record id

      This is used for update/delete operations - we don't need the account id in that case - and also when we don't have an account_record_id column (e.g.
      InternalCallContext InternalCallContextFactory.createInternalCallContext(UUID accountId, CallContext context)
      Create an internal call context using an existing account to retrieve tenant and account record ids

      This is used for r/w operations - we need the account id to populate the account_record_id field
      InternalCallContext InternalCallContextFactory.createInternalCallContext(UUID objectId, ObjectType objectType, CallContext context)
      Crate an internal call context from a call context, and retrieving the account_record_id from another table
